reviews.title: A Good Time
reviews.comment: I really like this game but I\'ve noticed some behavior that I don\'t know how to correct. The audio track is playing twice (on top of itself) and I don\'t know how to stop it. Uninstall/ reinstall of the software doesn\'t solve the problem. Any thoughts?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exellent game, love it.
reviews.comment: Graphics so much better than 9innings 2011 more realistic, love the action!
reviews.author: James Ball

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is an awesome game. I played the 2011 version and loved it. This one does not disappoint. It is plain awesome.

reviews.title: Still no trade deadline update!
reviews.comment: Many players have changed teams we are ready for our update mlb the show has uppdated rosters...still 5 star game tho
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I think this game\'s one of the best baseball games I\'ve ever played and one of the easiest.  Great job and hope to see and freely download new games in the not so distant future.\tSames as above.
reviews.author: danni schumacher

reviews.comment: the game is a very fun game have fun planned may the best app I\'ve ever downloaded\tshould have more players with more experience but other than that the game is very fun
reviews.author: Stephanie Tabb

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It\'s a great game in my opinion. Lots of fun and I would recommend it for anyone who likes playing baseball. I didn\'t like it at first, but this game changed my mind. :D

reviews.title: Terrific graphics! I love this. Homeruns are awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Great game GET IT! EXPERIENCE IT!  LOVE IT!!!!!

reviews.title: Very entertaining
reviews.comment: I\'ve played an earlier version of this game and loved it.  Just downloaded this version, and it is still great.  Fun to play and competitive.

reviews.title: Great!
